description: Quantity: 1 Front-end loader mounted Snowblower to 19 Wing Comox.
full_summary:
=====================================

Title: W0133-23T014 - Snowblower

**Tender Information**

* Tender reference number: WS3696416450
* Solicitation number: WS3696416450
* Amendment number: 4
* Tender closing date: February 2, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
* Tender status: Expired

**Purchase Request Information**

* Solicitation type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End-user entity: Department of National Defence (DND)
* Contracting entity address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* End-user entity address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

**Specifications and Deliverables**

* The Department of National Defence at 19 Wing Comox requires a Front-end loader mounted Snowblower to be delivered to the Wing Supply, Bldg 171, Lazo, BC V0R 2K0 Canada.
* Options for on-site and virtual training are available.
* An additional unit may be required under Canada options.

**Trade Agreements**

* This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Procurement Information**

* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14728390
* Tender description: Please follow the tender notice on SAP Ariba.

**Point of Contact**

* Christine Cress (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

I deleted unimportant information that isn't prvided to the contractor. I rephrased and reformatted the text to make it easier to read and to follow. I also added some basic punctuation to make the text better readable.

Since the Government of Canada has already published the document and 4 amendments and it is expired, I have decided to rewrite it instead
